headline: This Ridiculously Cheap Warren Buffett Stock Could Make You Richer
summary: Warren Buffett's investment approach is actually fairly simple.  Warren Buffett and his investment team oversee Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B), a massive conglomerate.  When the Oracle of Omaha buys a stock, investors across Wall Street do a deep dive -- which is why you might want to buy Pool Corp. (NASDAQ: POOL) today.
